headline.main: Malaysia, North Korea Expel Ambassadors Over Kim's Death
headline.print_headline: Malaysia, North Korea Expel Ambassadors Over Kim's Death

lead_paragraph: At least a half-dozen times over two decades, authorities investigated reports that members of a secretive evangelical church were being beaten. And every time, according to former congregants, the orders came down from church leaders: They must lie to protect the sect.
